content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani

content: Hello Juan, thank you for coming to see the apartment. Based on the information you provided, I propose a rental price of 500 Euros per month. This price includes utilities and any other necessary expenses. Is this acceptable to you?
name: Juan Mamani

content: No, I can't afford that. I was hoping for something more affordable. Can you lower the price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I'm sorry to hear that. Is there a specific price range you are looking for? I am willing to negotiate to find a price that works for both of us.
name: Juan Mamani

content:
I was thinking around 400 Euros per month. Is that possible?

Also, I have some questions. What is included in the rent price? Are there any additional fees or charges I should be aware of?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand your budget. Unfortunately, the current price I proposed is the lowest I can go. However, I am willing to include some additional services to make the rental more affordable for you. For example, I can pay for your internet and cable bills each month. Additionally, I can cover your electricity and water bills up to a certain amount.

As for additional fees, there is a one-time security deposit of 1000 Euros that you will need to pay upfront. This deposit will be returned to you at the end of the lease term, provided you have fulfilled your obligations.

Do these additional services and the security deposit make the rental price more acceptable to you?
name: Juan Mamani
